content.text:
# Twin Coast Discovery Highway

| map_custom = yes
}}
The Twin Coast Discovery Highway is an  circular road route of Northland, a region located in New Zealand. The name "Twin Coast Discovery" is so named because the route up to and back from Cape Reinga are on different coasts.
